original_text: Then Joshua called the twelve men, whom he had prepared of the children of Israel, out of every tribe a man:
korean_text: 여호수아가 이스라엘 자손 중에서 각 지파에 한 사람씩 준비한 그 열두 사람을 불러

sentences.original_text: Then Joshua called the twelve men
whom he had prepared of the children of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이스라엘 자손 중에서 준비해 둔 사람들이었다

sentences.original_text: out of every tribe a man
